description: Ryofu Housen, the peerless general of the heavens, master of horsemanship and archery, has crossed time and space and landed in modern-day Japan, intent on conquest, complete with halberd, horse and pheasant-tail headdress (listed height is with the headdress on) ... except that he is now stuck in the body of an elementary school girl! Hilarity ensues ...
name: Ryofuko
